pages.text: Stone generation in the world has drastically changed as you might have noticed. All stones can be crushed to yield various components. They can also be crafted to form polished and brick variants along with stairs, slabs, vertical slabs, walls, pressure plates and buttons.

pages.title: Strata
pages.text: The overworld generates with various layers of stone. The types of stone are based of biome category (ex: forest, taiga, birch forest are all Forests). The pattern and placement of certain stones is designed to reflect real-world counterparts while staying within the realm of minecraft. The config contains options for stone generation such as which blocks are used and in which biome they spawn.

pages.title: Intrusions
pages.text: Intrusions are pillars of rocks that emerge from bedrock. Some overworld stones and nether stones generate in this way. Configs for intrusion generation include which blocks to spawn and the chance.
